Name: Night Stalker
Story Background: The Night Stalker prowls the streets of the city, preying on the unsuspecting citizens who dare to venture out after dark.
Ability: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
Appearance Description: The Night Stalker is a sinister figure cloaked in darkness, with blood-red eyes that gleam with malice. Its fangs are sharp and ready to strike, as it lurks in the shadows, waiting for its next victim.
